channel.title: C++ on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Developer tools
item.description: To start every developper should have his own tool, in this post I will detail how to use Everything (Realtime filesystem indexing) To begin let’s start by downloding the tool from this link Downlaod link Introduction Everything it’s a tool that query NTFS filesystem for any change that happen to any referenced device and provide a way to have control over you machine. the binary it self is no more than 2 megs.
